1237.question: What languages are represented in the dataset?
1237.response: {'Answer': 'The dataset includes English, Japanese, Spanish, Arabic, Portuguese, Korean, Thai, French, Turkish, Russian, Italian, German, Polish, Dutch, Greek, Swedish, Farsi, Vietnamese, Finnish, Czech, Ukrainian, Hindi, Danish, Hungarian, Norwegian, Romanian, Serbian, Estonian, Slovenian, Gujarati,  Cypriot, Chinese,  Cambodian,  Icelandic, Lithuanian, Malayalam,  Sinhala,  Hebrew,  Northern Sami,  Kurdish,  Malay,  Myanmar,  Tagalog,  Kannada,  Tibetan,  Bengali,  Burmese,  Marathi,  Manipuri,  Assamese,  Urdu,  and  Tamil.'}
1237.answer: EN, JA, ES, AR, PT, KO, TH, FR, TR, RU, IT, DE, PL, NL, EL, SV, FA, VI, FI, CS, UK, HI, DA, HU, NO, RO, SR, LV, BG, UR, TA, MR, BN, IN, KN, ET, SL, GU, CY, ZH, CKB, IS, LT, ML, SI, IW, NE, KM, MY, TL, KA, BO
